text:
="preserve">Teck Whye LRT Station (BP4) is an LRT station Singapore. It is along the Bukit Panjang LRT Line. It was opened on 6 November 1999. The station is near ITE College West.
Former Codes.
Formerly the code was: A4 (1999 - 2001)
Following Stations.
Previous: Keat Hong (BP3)Next: Phoenix (BP5)
